page.title: 17ONE DAY IN TERESA'S FAMILY
page.content: My dad is in the Navy.He is based at Devonport dockyard.He leaves at 7am most mornings.My dad does night shift as well and he sleeps some of the next day.My mum is a housewife.She wakes up early in the morning to get us ready for school,get our breakfast and see us off.On Thursday she is extra busy because my nan comes to visit for the day. My sister is in J2M.Each night she brings home her reading book for my mum to listen to her and to improve her reading.She goes to bed at 7.30 pm so she will be up nice and early for school in the morning.My brother is also in J2M.He is very naughty. I am in J3C.We do maths,English and in the summer we go swimming.We have to take our work home if we dont finish it.I go to bed at 8pm so I am up nice and early for school.
